p: Two different datasets of genetic markers were used in this study: (i) twelve previously published microsatellite loci [A1, B2, B3, A9 (tri-nucleotide repeats), and AC2, CT2, AG2, AC4, AC1, AC5, AG1, and AG4 (di-nucleotide repeats)] [ 14, 15]; and (ii) a panel of ~25,000 SNPs [ 16]. The complete microsatellite dataset consisted of 1795 individuals from 56 populations (Fig. 1), while the SNP dataset consisted of 306 individuals from 30 populations (for details see Additional file 1: Table S1).
